September 21, 2017 <[[https://builttoadapt.io/that-moment-episode-5-our-country-is-always-under-construction-6297ecaa66a8?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> “Our Country is Always Under Construction” In Episode 5 of “That Moment,” Boeing Chief Information Officer Ted Colbert describes how the company’s shift to a digital transformation strategy may one day end flight delays…and propel commercial flight into Earth’s orbit. We also chat to former Secretary of Transportation Anthony Foxx about his transition from Charlotte’s youngest ever mayor to overseeing the nation’s roads, bridges, and transit, plus how technology could unite—or divide—our country along racial and economic lines.
